summary:
This mod simply makes healing potions heal more HP. 3 different versions available.
I created this to fulfill a user request on r/skyrimmods.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Arial][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/91173/91173-1525605458-1076337111.png[/img]﻿


[size=4]This mod simply makes healing potions heal more HP. Three different versions are available.[/size][/font]

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/91173/91173-1525605831-1038148265.png[/img]﻿﻿

[font=Arial][size=3]The Potion of Ultimate Healing wasn't changed, as it already gives you full health.
I also did not alter any of the potions the player can create at an alchemy table.[/size]

I made this to fulfill a mod request on r/skyrimmods.

[/font][font=Arial][size=5]
Installation[/size]

[u][size=3]NOTICE: Use only one of the versions![/size][/u]

[size=4]NMM, Vortex, MO:[/size]

Just download one of the versions with your manager and install them as usual. Then activate the esp.

[size=4]Manual installation:[/size]

Drag and drop the "DYL_Better_Healing_Potions_Vxxx.esp", found in the downloaded zip,
into your ...\Steam\steamapps\common\Skyrim\Data folder, and activate the esp in your game launcher.

[size=5]
Deinstallation[/size]

Just uninstall the mod with your Mod Manager, or delete the esp from your Data folder.


[size=5]Compatibility[/size]
[size=2]
Generally speaking this is compatible with almost anything.
However it isn't compatible with [/size]mods, that change the same items.
If you are using a mod that changes these potions,
but want to use the changes I made, just load my mod after the other one.

[size=3]
Created with Construction Kit[/size][/font][/center]
author: DontYouLaugh
